# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its high-quality features and exceptional performance, it's truly a valuable asset for anyone looking to enhance their experience. I believe you would find immense value in it, given its worth of $120 to me. Considering its worth to you is $80, I kindly propose to offer it to you for $95. This way, you get a great deal while also allowing me to maximize my earnings. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer
